Subject: THE ark
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Epyon::

He sat back in his chair.
"We're going to the surface, in transport ships. The starship will
remain in orbit. Depending on the situation we will either go back to
Cybertron to report, or stay. If we stay the ship will be autopiloted
back, and the transports will be destroyed."
He looked at the wounderful planet on the view screen.
"Prepare for departure, and get to the ships. I'll set the autopilot,
take a manual controler for the ship, and follow you down."
